TYPES.FPCLINE: * INTERFACE DESCRIPTION: Interface for Purchase Order form
* DESCRIPTION: Interface for Purchase Order form
ebelp TYPE ebelp, "Item Number of Purchasing Document
meins TYPE bstme, "Purchase Order Unit of Measure
ismnrinyear TYPE ismnrimjahr, "Issue Number (in Year Number)
ismcopynr TYPE ismheftnummer, "Copy Number of Media Issue
ismissuetypest TYPE char4, "Issue Variant Type - Standard (Planned)
zterm TYPE dzterm, "Terms of Payment Key
vtext TYPE dzterm_bez, "Description of terms of payment
ismnrinyear TYPE ismnrimjahr, "Issue Number (in Year Number)
ismcopynr TYPE ismheftnummer, "Copy Number of Media Issue
ismissuetypest TYPE char4, "Issue Variant Type - Standard (Planned)
idcodetype TYPE ismidcodetype, "Type of Identification Code
objek TYPE objnum, "Key of object to be classified
adzhl TYPE adzhl, "Internal counter for archiving objects via engin. chg. mgmt
lifnr TYPE lifnr, "Account Number of Vendor or Creditor
TYPES: tt_final TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_final,
tt_mara TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_mara WITH NON-UNIQUE SORTED KEY
tt_makt TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_makt WITH NON-UNIQUE SORTED KEY
tt_jptidcdassign TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_jptidcdassign WITH NON-UNIQUE SORTED KEY
tt_ausp TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_ausp WITH NON-UNIQUE SORTED KEY
tt_tvzbt TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_tvzbt INITIAL SIZE 0.

INITIALIZATION.FPCLINE: * DESCRIPTION: Interface for Purchase Order form
DATA:li_mara TYPE tt_mara, " Local Internal Table of Table type of TT_MARA
li_makt TYPE tt_makt, " Local Internal Table of Table type of TT_MAKT
li_jptidcdassign TYPE tt_jptidcdassign, " Local Internal Table of Table type of TT_JPTIDCDASSIGN
li_ausp_temp TYPE tt_ausp, " Local Internal Table of Table type of TT_AUSP
li_ausp TYPE tt_ausp. " Local Internal Table of Table type of TT_AUSP
******Perform is used to get the Payment Terms Description
******Perform to populate the system date in the header part of the form
******in which a FM has been used to change the date format to DD-MMM-YYYY.
******Perform to populate the PO date in the header part of the form
******in which a FM has been used to change the date format to DD-MMM-YYYY.
******Get Company Address which has been used to populate the Company Address Node
******Get Vendor Address which has been used to populate the Vendor Address Node
*******Populate Number of lines To be used in Adress Node

FORMS.FPCLINE: * INTERFACE DESCRIPTION: Interface for Purchase Order form
* DESCRIPTION: Interface for Purchase Order form
* DESCRIPTION: To change the logic for supplimetary based on matnr's 8th
FORM f_get_logo CHANGING fp_v_xstring TYPE xstring.
CONSTANTS : lc_logo_name TYPE tdobname VALUE 'ZJWILEY_LOGO', " Name
lc_object TYPE tdobjectgr VALUE 'GRAPHICS', " SAPscript Graphics Management: Application object
lc_id TYPE tdidgr VALUE 'BMAP', " SAPscript Graphics Management: ID
lc_btype TYPE tdbtype VALUE 'BMON'. " Graphic type
******To Get a BDS Graphic in BMP Format (Using a Cache)
* No need to raise the messages, Form will be printed
* Perfrom to get the payment term description
FORM f_get_pay_des USING fp_header TYPE mmpur_print_ekko
* Populate Date Using the FM HR_IN_GET_DATE_COMPONENTS to
* change the date format to DD_MMM_YYYY
FORM f_get_date USING fp_date TYPE sy-datum
DATA :lv_day TYPE char2, " Date of type CHAR2
lv_month_c2 TYPE char2, " Mnthc2 of type CHAR2
lv_month_c3 TYPE char3, " Mnthc3 of type CHAR3
lv_month TYPE t247-ltx, " Month long text
lv_year TYPE char4. " Year of type CHAR4
*******FM to change the date format to DD_MMM_YYYY
* Populate Country key which has been used in Wiley Address Node
FORM f_get_add USING fp_header TYPE mmpur_print_ekko
INTO fp_st_t001 "Global workarea for structure ty_t001
* Populating sending country key of organistion address
* which has been used in the Adddress Node for Wiley Address.
* Populate Country key which has been used in Vendor Address Node
FORM f_get_vend_add USING fp_header TYPE mmpur_print_ekko
SELECT SINGLE lifnr "Account Number of Vendor or Creditor
FROM lfa1 "Table for Vendor Master (General Section)
* Populating sending country key of vendor address
* which has been used in the Adddress Node for Vendor Address.
FORM f_get_data USING fp_item TYPE ty_mmpur_print_ekpo
param1 TYPE rvari_vnam, "ABAP: Name of Variant Variable
param2 TYPE rvari_vnam, "ABAP: Name of Variant Variable
srno TYPE tvarv_numb, "ABAP: Current selection number
sign TYPE tvarv_sign, "ABAP: ID: I/E (include/exclude values)
low TYPE salv_de_selopt_low, "Lower Value of Selection Condition
high TYPE salv_de_selopt_high, "Upper Value of Selection Condition
activate TYPE zconstactive, "Activation indicator for constant
sign TYPE tvarv_sign, "ABAP: ID: I/E (include/exclude values)
low TYPE salv_de_selopt_low, "Lower Value of Selection Condition
high TYPE salv_de_selopt_high, "Upper Value of Selection Condition
DATA: lst_final TYPE ty_final, " Local workarea for final internal table
lst_mara TYPE ty_mara, " Local workarea of ty_mara
lst_makt TYPE ty_makt, " Local workarea of ty_makt
lst_jptidcdassign TYPE ty_jptidcdassign, " Local workarea of ty_jptidcdassign
lst_ausp TYPE ty_ausp, " Local workarea of ty_ausp
lv_objek TYPE ausp-objek, " local variable of type objek
lr_ausp TYPE REF TO ty_ausp, " Local reference of type ty_ausp
lst_item TYPE mmpur_print_ekpo, " Local workarea for table item
lst_schedule TYPE mmpur_print_eket, " Local workarea for schedule
lv_datum_eindt TYPE char15, " Local variable of char15
li_constant TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF lty_constant INITIAL SIZE 0,
li_range TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF lty_range INITIAL SIZE 0,
******If item[] have the value then using this table
******fetch the data from MARA table using MATNR of item[]
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM li_item COMPARING matnr.
******If li_mara[] have the value then using this table
******fetch the data from MAKT table using MATNR of li_mara or ISMREFMDPROD of li_mara
param1 " ABAP: Name of Variant Variable
param2 " ABAP: Name of Variant Variable
low " Lower Value of Selection Condition
high " Upper Value of Selection Condition
********If li_item[] have the value then using this table
******fetch the data from JPTIDCDASSIGN table using MATNR of li_item[]
FROM jptidcdassign "IS-M: Assignment of ID Codes to Material
******Here, as per requirement by passing the value of MATNR of fp_item[] to
******OBJEK of AUSP is needed to fetch the value of ATINN(Print ISSN) but the length of
******both the field is not matching so the following logic is done.
******If fp_li_ausp_temp[] have the value then using this table
******fetch the data from AUSP table using OBJEK of fp_li_ausp_temp[]
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM fp_li_ausp_temp COMPARING objek.
SELECT objek "Key of object to be classified
adzhl "Internal counter for archiving objects via engin. chg. mgmt
******By looping the fp_item table populate line,issue number,print & bind qty, UOM.
READ TABLE fp_schedule INTO lst_schedule WITH KEY ebeln = lst_item-ebeln
*******Perform is used to change the format of the delivery date
*******Populate the DD-MMM-YYYY formated delivery date in the line item
******Populate Journal Number, Journal Issue, Journal Volume
* BOC by PBANDLAPAL on 06-Sep-2017 for ERP-4172 ED2K908429
* EOC by PBANDLAPAL on 06-Sep-2017 for ERP-4172 ED2K908429
READ TABLE fp_li_makt INTO lst_makt TRANSPORTING maktx
WITH TABLE KEY matnr COMPONENTS matnr = lst_mara-ismrefmdprod .
READ TABLE fp_li_makt INTO lst_makt TRANSPORTING maktx
WITH TABLE KEY matnr COMPONENTS matnr = lst_item-matnr .
READ TABLE fp_li_jptidcdassign INTO lst_jptidcdassign TRANSPORTING identcode
WITH TABLE KEY matnr COMPONENTS matnr = lst_item-matnr.
* READ TABLE fp_li_ausp REFERENCE INTO lr_ausp WITH TABLE KEY objek COMPONENTS
* IF lr_ausp IS BOUND AND sy-subrc = 0.
